item.description:
http://www.as220.org/...

The FooFest is an all day event for $5 on Empire Street.

Before summer is over I want to check out the Saturday Night Dance party at Tazza. Whoever wants to join up we can exchange numbers. This is more of an opportunity for small groups to gather at various spots in downtown or run into each other rather than a structured event all night.

10pm is Sun Ra Arkestra http://www.elrarecord...

by 11pm Tazza should be rockin.

Could meet around 9 somewhere.
item.name: Downtown - FooFest and/or Dance at Tazza
